practice_phrases.target: I want to remember this word.
I'm not going to remember easily.
I want to remember how to say this.
I'm trying to remember the answer as hard as I can.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我在学习，所以我想记住。
practice_phrases.target: Because I'm learning, I want to remember.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我不会轻易记住她的名字。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm not going to remember her name easily.

practice_phrases.known: 我不确定我能不能记住怎么用英语说。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not sure if I can remember how to say it in English.
